column4: Weird, xIRC crashed. Anyway, I'm not sure if anyone responded... Is there a way to change your keyboard layout from qwerty to dvorak and back whenever I feel the need?
if you put the keyboard applet in the panel and mess w/ keyboard preferences you can do it - i have
thing is i need to put the letters on the keys so i can actually start learning dvorak
i was saying some stuff - did you get it?
